title: Bilgewater Troubles
body: I don't know if I just don't understand how it to sign up for the event but basically I did choose the reward path for the story (TF) and it asks me to get 25 000g and 50assist, but I just played two arams and two classics and that hasn't gone up one point. Am I missing something? are their criteria I have to meet or some sort of item I have to get or something? Help will, of course, be appreciated.

replies.body: Riot as confirmed that they're aware of the issues been happening to me for couple of days now!
It's just not updating, happened yesterday for me. Logged in today and I got my icon.
